body_html:
Hi Martin,

Here is the code for reproducing the bug. I have made the code much simpler, and only have two hidden layers, a very moderate NN.

To run the code, type

python TFDebug.py

After about 5000 iterations, the bad model parameters will be printed out.

I have tested it on all platforms that I have (ubuntu CPU, ubuntu GPU and Mac OS).

All show the same type of error.

Many thanks.

BWT, since I have the source code, if you can point out which codes are related to the problem, I can also try to debug it.

Jiabo

TFDebug.txt

body:
Hi Martin,

Here is the code for reproducing the bug. I have made the code much simpler, and only have two hidden layers, a very moderate NN. 

To run the code, type

python TFDebug.py

After about 5000 iterations, the bad model parameters will be printed out. 

I have tested it on all platforms that I have (ubuntu CPU, ubuntu GPU and Mac OS).

All show the same type of error. 

Many thanks.

BWT, since I have the source code, if you can point out which codes are related to the problem, I can also try to debug it.

Jiabo

[TFDebug.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/209258/TFDebug.txt)
